INDICATOR DESCRIPTION: Mobile cellular subscriptions per 100 population. Mobile cellular telephone subscriptions are subscriptions to a public mobile telephone service using cellular technology, which provide access to the public switched telephone network. Post-paid and prepaid subscriptions are included.

INDICATOR DESCRIPTION: Telephone lines per 100 population. Telephone lines are fixed telephone lines that connect a subscriber's terminal equipment to the public switched telephone network and that have a port on a telephone exchange. Integrated services digital network channels ands fixed wireless subscribers are included.
SOURCE: Instituto Nacional de Estadisticas y Censos, Republica de Argentina - Ceso Nacional de Poblacion y Vivienda 2010
